      • bestAnswer

        public void bestAnswer(domain.User logged,
              java.lang.Integer questionID,
              java.lang.Integer answerID)
                throws utils.ContentsException
        Set the best answer of a question, only the author of the question can do this
        Parameters:
        logged - the user that want's to set the best answer
        questionID - the id of the question that will receive the best answer
        answerID - the id of the answer that will be set as the best answer
        Throws:
        utils.ContentsException - in case the user that try to set a best answer is not the author of the question

        Parameters:
        logged - the user that wants to close a question
        questionID - the id of the question that will be closed
        Throws:
        utils.ContentsException - in case the user that try changes the question's status isn't at least a ADMIN
